sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import "../style.css"; const Navbar: React.FC = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const navButton = "text-md py-2 px-4 rounded-md hover:bg-green1 transition-colors duration-300"; const navButtons = "w-full text-md py-2 px-4 rounded-md hover:bg-green1 transition-colors duration-300"; return (

Online Shop

  • `${navButton} ${isActive ? 'text-green1' : ''}`} > Home
  • `${navButton} ${isActive ? 'text-green1' : ''}`} > Our Products
  • `${navButton} ${isActive ? 'text-green2' : ''}`} > Shopping Cart
  • `${navButton} ${isActive ? 'text-green2' : ''}`}> User Detail
{isOpen && (
  • `${navButtons} ${isActive ? 'text-green2' : ''}`}> Home
  • `${navButtons} ${isActive ? 'text-green2' : ''}`}> Our Products
  • `${navButtons} ${isActive ? 'text-green2' : ''}`}> Shopping Cart
  • `${navButtons} ${isActive ? 'text-green2' : ''}`}> User Detail
)}
); } export default Navbar;
